pr_title: Remove worker hostname from ALLUXIO_JAVA_OPTS in helmchart

timeline.message: Rmove alluxio worker hostname from ALLUXIO_JAVA_OPTS, to #28465442

timeline.bodyText: I think "Removed alluxio.worker.hostname from ALLUXIO_JAVA_OPTS for Fuse" is better?

 - Made the single master access itself without service
